In this [93mstudy[0m, a [93mnovel[0m [93mcomposite[0m [93madsorbent[0m was [93mdeveloped[0m by [93mintegrating[0m [93mgreen[0m-[93msynthesized[0m [93mnano[0m-[93mcalcium[0m [93moxide[0m ([93mnCaO[0m) with [93mhumic[0m [93macid[0m ([93mHA[0m) [93mvia[0m an [93maqueous[0m [93mco[0m-[93mprecipitation[0m [93mmethod[0m and [93multrasonic[0m-[93massisted[0m [93mstabilization[0m. [93mCharacterization[0m ([93mXRD[0m, [93mFTIR[0m, [93mSEM[0m, [93mBET[0m) [93mconfirmed[0m the [93mformation[0m of a [93mmesoporous[0m [95mhybrid[0m with a [93msurface[0m [93marea[0m of [93m112[0m.[93m6[0m [93mm²[0m [93mg[0m⁻[93m¹[0m, [93maverage[0m [93mpore[0m [93msize[0m of [93m6[0m.[93m3[0m [93mnm[0m, and [93menhanced[0m [93msurface[0m [93mbasicity[0m [93mdue[0m to [93mHA[0m [93mfunctionalization[0m. [93mBatch[0m [93madsorption[0m [93mexperiments[0m [93mdemonstrated[0m that an [93moptimal[0m [93mdosage[0m of [93m5[0m [93mg[0m [93mL[0m⁻[93m¹[0m [93machieved[0m [93m82[0m.[93m4[0m% [93mCOD[0m [93mremoval[0m, [93m76[0m.[93m1[0m% [93mTOC[0m [93mreduction[0m, and [93m89[0m.[93m5[0m% [93mcolor[0m [93mremoval[0m within [93m90[0m [93mmin[0m, [93msurpassing[0m [93mconventional[0m [93mtreatments[0m [93msuch[0m as [93mlime[0m [93mneutralization[0m, [93mFenton[0m [93moxidation[0m, [93manaerobic[0m [93mdigestion[0m, and [93mbiochar[0m [92msystems[0m under [93mcomparable[0m [93mconditions[0m. The [93macidic[0m [93mvinasse[0m ([93mpH[0m < [93m4[0m) was [93mneutralized[0m to [93m7[0m.[93m6[0m ± [93m0[0m.[93m2[0m without the [93maddition[0m of [93mexternal[0m [93malkali[0m. The [93mincorporation[0m of a [93mchalcogel[0m [93mstage[0m [93mfurther[0m [93mpromoted[0m [93mprecipitation[0m of [93msuspended[0m [93msolids[0m and [93mvolatile[0m [93mfatty[0m [93macids[0m, [93mreducing[0m [93mresidual[0m [93morganic[0m [93mload[0m. [93mKinetic[0m [92mmodeling[0m [93mindicated[0m a [93mpseudo[0m-[93msecond[0m-[93morder[0m [93mfit[0m ([93mR²[0m = [93m0[0m.[93m991[0m), [93msuggesting[0m a [93mchemisorption[0m-[93mdominated[0m [93mmechanism[0m [93mcoupled[0m with [93macid[0m-[93mbase[0m [93mneutralization[0m and [93mpartial[0m [93mprecipitation[0m. [93mReusability[0m [93mtesting[0m [93mconfirmed[0m ≥ [93m68[0m% [93mefficiency[0m [93mretention[0m after [93mfour[0m [93mcycles[0m. [93mSustainability[0m [93mevaluation[0m [93musing[0m the [93mNeed[0m [93mQuality[0m [93mSustainability[0m ([93mNQS[0m) [93mindex[0m and [93mKoel[0m'[93ms[0m [93mPyramid[0m [93mmetrics[0m [93mindicated[0m [93mfavorable[0m [93menvironmental[0m and [93moperational[0m [93mperformance[0m, [93maligning[0m with [93mUN[0m [93mSDG[0m [93m6[0m ([93mClean[0m [93mWater[0m and [93mSanitation[0m) and [93mSDG[0m [93m12[0m ([93mResponsible[0m [93mConsumption[0m and [93mProduction[0m).
